Name: Law and Order

Dices.Dice 0: slash: 2~6 On Clash Win Deal 2 damage to opponent

Obtained: Streetlight Office, Vol. Ⅱ, Book of San, Zwei South Section 6, Zwei South Section 6, Vol. Ⅱ, Book of Julia, Book of Isadora, Book of Walter

Name: Shoving Stab

Dices.Dice 1: pierce: 7~12 On Clash Win Inflict 3 Bleednext Scene

Obtained: Book of Dong-hwan the Grade 1 Fixer

Name: The Will of the City
Effect: On Use Restore 3 Light; draw 1 page

Name: Prescript-Ⅳ
Effect: Only 1 Prescript page can be used per Scene On Play; Target Ally Target restores 1 Light

Name: Flash of Sunup

Dices.Dice 2: evade: 1~4 On Clash Win Reduce Power of opponent’s next die by 2

Obtained: Book of Dawn Office, Book of Salvador, Book of Yuna

Dices.Dice 1: slash: 1~4 On Hit Deal 5 Stagger damage to target

Name: Brace Up
Effect: On Use Discard a random page; draw 2 pages at the start of the next Scene
Obtained: Book of Hana Association, Book of Mirinae, Book of Harold, Book of Olivier

Dices.Dice 0: slash: 3~6 On Hit Inflict 1 Bleednext Scene
Dices.Dice 1: slash: 3~5 On Hit Inflict 1 Bleednext Scene

Name: Frontal Assault
Obtained: Liu Association Section 2, Vol. Ⅰ, Liu Association Section 2, Vol. Ⅱ, Book of Lowell, Book of Cecil, Book of Mei
